description:
Smooth seas stretch out before the Straw Hats as they leave Punk Hazard far behind. While they fear Donflamingo`s return and prepare to face him, another powerful foe lies in wait - one whose power could be their downfall!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Caesar Goes Missing! The Pirate Alliance Makes a Sortie!
César disparaît. L’alliance pirate passe à l’action !
Цезарь пропал! Пиратский Альянс на вылазке!
انقلاب الطاولة! يضرب لوفي بلكمته الحديديّة الغاضبة!
消えたシーザー! 海賊同盟出撃
